sourcesContent:
<template>
  {{ product.name }}
</template>

<script>
//import { ref } from "vue";
import { computed } from "vue";
import { useStore } from "vuex";
export default {
  name: "SingleProduct",
  components: {},
  setup(props) {
    const store = useStore();
    store.dispatch("getProductById", props.id);

    return {
      product: computed(() => store.getters.product),
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
